name: Element Smash LD35 Edition
description:
Choose your element every 15 seconds and try to kick your opponent out of the playfield

  • 3 characters: Fire, Plant, and Water
  • Single player or local 1v1 multiplayer game
  • Colorful pixelart with an arcade vibe
  • State of the art bfxr sound effects!

Made in 48h for Ludum Dare 35 in collaboration with @devMidgard

Music by OneCoolDog
